alert.note: Alert for Harding; Mora (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 4:50PM MDT until June 07 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... Southeastern Mora County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 449 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Wagon Mound, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wagon Mound, Roy and Mills. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 382 and 391. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
